hgr::TransformAnimation Class Reference
[Hierarchical graphics library]

#include <TransformAnimation.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::TransformAnimation:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Key frame based affine transformation animation container.


Public Types

enum  BehaviourType {
  BEHAVIOUR_REPEAT, BEHAVIOUR_OSCILLATE, BEHAVIOUR_RESET, BEHAVIOUR_STOP,

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum hgr::TransformAnimation::BehaviourType
 

Animation playback end behaviour.

Enumeration values:
BEHAVIOUR_REPEAT  Animation loops to start after reaching end.
BEHAVIOUR_OSCILLATE  Animation changes direction at the ends.
BEHAVIOUR_RESET  Animation resets to start frame at the end.
BEHAVIOUR_STOP  Animation stops at the last frame.
BEHAVIOUR_COUNT  Number of supported behaviours.

int  rotkeys,
int  sclkeys,
int  poskeyrate,
int  rotkeyrate,
int  sclkeyrate
) 
 

Creates a transform animation with space for specified animation channels.

Parameters:
endbehaviour Animation playback end behaviour.
poskeys Number of position key frames.
rotkeys Number of rotation key frames.
sclkeys Number of scale key frames.
poskeyrate Sample rate of position keys.
rotkeyrate Sample rate of rotation keys.
sclkeyrate Sample rate of scale keys.
